Node.definition: literally: to come out; = process by which land or a living organism produces crops, branches, horns, or fruits
= limb ◄ springing from a tree or bough, ► which can be used to beat someone, ≈ but also symbolizes a new beginning

= the main body of a tree, which is either the part that remains in the earth after the stem or trunk is cut off, or a branch that is planted with the intention that it develops new roots; ≈ symbol of something apparently dead that has the potential for renewed life
= man; ◄ son of Obed (עֹובֵד) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► father of David (דָּוִד)
= a young branch springing from the main stock of a tree or plant; ≈ often used in a figurative sense to denote human offspring
= a part of a plant normally below ground, which acts as a support and collects water and nourishment, ≈ associated with well being, offspring, and the inclination of the mind
= process by which a branch grows out of the stump or the root of a tree, or by which a plant grows directly out of the soil

= an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
= state whereby someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

= an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)
= the ability to accomplish great things because of characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

= an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)
literally: knowing; hence: = a collection of information stored and processed in someone's mind that gives that person the ability to analyse, discern, make decisions and act accordingly
= state in which humans experience fear
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans experience fear
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= the part of an object that can be seen with the eye

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry
= action by which someone with judicial authority settles a dispute between two parties

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= a person or class of people that lack the means to support themselves; ≈ thereby often despised or mistreated, but being under God's protection
= action by which someone with judicial authority settles a dispute between two parties
literally: smoothness; hence: = state in which an event is morally and ethically right

= state of persons who are suffering and unable to help themselves ◄ because of their own need or status, or the result of someone else's behavior ≈ often used positively of persons who are sincere and not arrogant in their behavior

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
literally: staff; hence: = state of authority over someone else symbolized by a scepter
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
literally: (God's) breath; hence: = process by which humans are punished by God, ◄ described as a flaming breath coming from his mouth

Node.gloss: to cause to die|to kill|to put to death
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness

= strip ◄ of linen or leather; ► worn around the waist to hold one's robe in place; sometimes used to keep money and other things; ≈ since it is worn so close to one's body it is sometimes associated with a person's basic principles

= the two sides of the body of humans and certain animals between the rib cage and the hips, ► which is the place where people normally tie a girdle, breeches, loincloth, or sackcloth; ≈ a symbol of strength
= state in which humans and deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their actions

= strip ◄ of linen or leather; ► worn around the waist to hold one's robe in place; sometimes used to keep money and other things; ≈ since it is worn so close to one's body it is sometimes associated with a person's basic principles
= area located on both sides of spine between false ribs and hip bone; ◄ part of human body; ≈ often used to indicate the entire waist region of the body; euphemism for male genitals

Node.gloss: to sojourn|to live as alien|to dwell
Node.definition: = state in which humans live in a place which is not their place of origin or nationality, either permanently or for a substantial period of time

= wild, four footed, predatory canine; light brown fur, similar to jackal, but much bigger; ◄ Canis lupus; ► commonly prey on flocks; ≈ regarded as ravenous and fierce; symbol of roaming, opportunistic, dangerous, fierce, and clever banditry
= young of a sheep (שֶׂה) either male or female; ► eaten at Passover, and used for sacrifice; its fleece is used for clothing

= one of the great cat family of about 2 m in length and of a yellowish brown color with black spots arranged in rosettes all over the body and the tail; ◄ Panthera pardus; ► hunts by stalking prey; ≈ symbol of violent danger
= the male young of a goat (עֵז)
= action by which humans or animals assume a horizontal position, either to rest or to attack
= male young of a cow (פָּרָה) ► used as a symbol for a deity; also used as sacrifice; ≈ associated with being willful and untrained
= a young male lion (אֲרִי) ≈ regarded as fierce and dangerous
= a young animal that has been fattened to prepare it for slaughter, either for food or sacrifice
= state in which humans or objects are jointly involved in an event
= state in which humans are relatively young, ≈ which is sometimes associated with being weak and inexperienced, but also with being healthy
= female bovine; ► clean animal

= large mammal with thick fur and a rather doglike face; walks on all fours but may stand up on its back legs to get a better view; maybe 2 meters tall when standing up and weigh over 200 kilos; feeds on roots, berries, wild fruit, mice, and lizards, and, occasionally, small livestock; ◄ |iUrsus arctos syriacus|i*; ► dangerous when provoked or robbed of cubs; ≈ associated with violence and danger
= action by which animals are feeding on grass and other edible materials in the field, ≈ often extended to denote the way a king cares for his subjects or the way God cares for his people
= state in which humans or objects are jointly involved in an event
= action by which humans or animals assume a horizontal position, either to rest or to attack
= posterity of humans and or animals of undetermined sex, at an age ranging from before birth to adulthood

= the largest of the great cats, often being about 2.8 meters from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; around the neck and shoulders of adult males grows a mane that is darker than the rest of their fur; ◄ Panthera leo; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression, fearlessness, and respect

= large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= dried stalks of grain and grasses, usually left over from harvesting grain ► used as food for animals or as an ingredient for making clay bricks; ≈ associated with something of little value
= a child that is still drinking milk from its mother's breasts
= empty, open place ◄ in a solid body

= snake with the ability to spread the ribs in the neck area, so as to form a broad, flat profile called the hood, which makes it look thicker than it really is; reaches two meters in length and 50 millimeters in diameter; it is dark brown with a yellowish underside; very poisonous; feeds on mice, gerbils, birds, bird eggs, lizards, frogs, and other snakes; ≈ associated with great danger
= hole in the ground; ► place where an animal lives

= extremely poisonous snake with the ability to spread the ribs in the neck area so as to form a broad, flat profile; dark brown in color with a yellowish underside (and sometimes yellowish bands); ◄ Desert Cobra (|iWalterinnesia aegyptia|i*) or Egyptian Cobra (|iNaja haje|i*); ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression and lurking danger

= an infant who has recently become accustomed to food other than its mother's milk; ≈ associated with inner peace and satisfaction as a weaned child does not continually search for its mother's breast anymore

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= causative action by which humans place part of their body in a certain location

Node.gloss: to do harm (to someone)|to make suffer|to deal, treat harshly|to afflict
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities bring suffering or disaster upon a humans, often as the result of wrong behavior
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
= state or process by which a location is dominated by a certain event, to the extent that it dominates everything else, ◄ as if it were completely filled with that event

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= state in which humans or deities are acquainted with facts, truths, or principles, as a result of experience, study or investigation

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water
= state or process by which a surface is covered by another object, ► often making this surface more or less invisible

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= a part of a plant normally below ground, which acts as a support and collects water and nourishment, ≈ associated with well being, offspring, and the inclination of the mind
= man; ◄ son of Obed (עֹובֵד) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► father of David (דָּוִד)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= a distinctive object in the form of a flag or board attached to a stick, or a metal device or image fitted on the end of a pole; ► normally used to identify a particular group, or as a rallying point for soldiers in war; ≈ often used figuratively to denote an example, or a person or deity that one can rely on, or something that shows the way

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= action by which humans request information from a deity or other spiritual being, usually through the intermediary of a priest, prophet, or medium
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= process by which an action is repeated or continued
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= state in which a countable entity is the second in a range
literally: hand; hence: = action by which humans or deities exert strength and power

Node.gloss: to acquire|to obtain|to purchase|to buy|to reclaim
Node.definition: = action by which humans acquire an animate or inanimate object ◄ by means of a financial transaction or in another way

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= nation; ◄ located in Northern Mesopotamia with Nineveh (נִינְוֵה) as its capital; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= region; ◄ in southern Egypt (מִצְרַיִם) upper Nile (יְאֹר) area
= ethnic group and their territory, ◄ regarded as descendants of Cush, son of Ham (חָם)
= nation ◄ located between Mesopotamia (אֲרַם נַהֲרַיִם) and Persia (פָּרַס) regarded as founded by a person with the same name
= region; ◄ in Mesopotamia
= town, area; ◄ on Orontes river in Syria (אֲרָם) ► capital of Aramean (אֲרַמִּי) kingdom; its inhabitants were relocated to Samaria (שֹׁמְרֹון) by the king of Assyria (אַשּׁוּר)
= area located near the sea and/or the people living there; ≈ associated with commerce, remoteness, paganism, but also called on to acknowledge YHWH
literally: the sea; hence: = a large body of salt water located between Europe and Africa, west of Canaan/Israel
= causative action by which humans or forces take hold of objects and cause them to rise up from a certain location

= a distinctive object in the form of a flag or board attached to a stick, or a metal device or image fitted on the end of a pole; ► normally used to identify a particular group, or as a rallying point for soldiers in war; ≈ often used figuratively to denote an example, or a person or deity that one can rely on, or something that shows the way

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= to bring together people, animals, plants, and/or other things from different places for a common purpose
= person or animal that has been caused to leave their place or position by force

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= causative action by which humans or deities cause humans or animals to come together as a group for a common purpose
= state in which a countable entity is four in number
= part where converging sides or edges of an object meet; ≈ sometimes associated with the far side of an object

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= process by which humans or deities experience a sentiment of anger with regard to someone else, ◄ because that other person has qualities, privileges, or possessions that one feels one should have as well, or because that person lavishes favors on another party that one feels should be directed to oneself
= reference to the northern kingdom of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) of which Ephraim was the most important tribe

= a causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to experience extreme anxiety, ◄ as a result of difficult circumstances, as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped place from which there is no escape

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
literally: to cut off (people); hence: = causative action by which humans and deities cause (other) humans to die a violent death
= reference to the northern kingdom of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) of which Ephraim was the most important tribe

Node.gloss: to envy|to be envious|to be jealous of (someone else)
Node.definition: = process by which humans experience a sentiment of anger with regard to someone else, ◄ because that other person has qualities, privileges, or possessions that one feels one should have as well, or because that person lavishes favors on another party that one feels should be directed to oneself

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= person that opposes other people and so is a cause of distress to others

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= reference to the northern kingdom of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) of which Ephraim was the most important tribe
literally: to fly; hence: = action by which humans move with great speed ◄ like a bird
literally: shoulder; hence: = side of a mountain or hill
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)
literally: the sea; = a cardinal direction pointing towards the west, ◄ which, in Israel, is the direction towards the Mediterranean Sea
= state in which humans or objects are jointly involved in an event
= action by which someone takes all sorts of goods (including people and animals) by force from an enemy in war

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

literally: children of a town, region, nation; hence: = people, animals, or products that are inhabitants of or originating from a place, town, region, or nation, ◄ as if they were the offspring of that place
= nation; ◄ considered descendants of Esau (עֵשָׂו)
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)

Node.gloss: to stretch out (one's) hand > to lift a hand (to do something)
Node.definition: literally: to stretch out (one's) hand (to do something); hence: = action by which humans take a conscious decision to perform a certain event
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= nation; ◄ situated E. of river Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) according to founded by Ben Ammi (בֶּן־עַמִּי) son of Lot (לֹוט)
= causative action by which deities split a body of water into two parts
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a broad inlet of the sea where the land curves inward
literally: sea of Egypt; hence, possibly: = a reference to the Red Sea which is shaped like a tongue
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= large body of flowing water ◄ located in Mesopotamia
literally: (God's) breath; hence: = process by which humans are punished by God, ◄ described as a flaming breath coming from his mouth
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
= a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season

Node.gloss: to tread|to set foot (on something)|to march|to move
Node.definition: = action by which humans or animals move forward by lifting and setting down each foot in turn
= a covering for the foot ◄ usually made of leather or wood ► either open and laced around the foot or ankle with a strap, or closed around the foot like a shoe
= a relatively wide road or access ramp made by by covering the surface of the ground with thicks layers of sand
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= nation; ◄ located in Northern Mesopotamia with Nineveh (נִינְוֵה) as its capital; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
